turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi, how do you feel about the charity Save the Children

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sorry couldn't type for some reason. I feel like they are a good organization. Can you tell me more about them

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Those are all good things.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: If you really look, you can see the future in every child. Through the power of child sponsorship, you can help a child in need realize her dreams Â¡Âª transforming her life and the future we all share. Sponsor a child today! Find your child  Somewhere, a child is waiting for you. Through child sponsorship, you can be the hero in the life of a child in need. You can make sure they grow up healthy, educated and safe

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How does this charity fund themselves.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We rely soley on volunteers and donations.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Is this like some of those charities that consume most of the funds themselves and do not actually contribute much to the cause.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: no not at all, Emergency Alert Right now, Save the Children remains gravely concerned about the well-being of children in the custody of the U.S. government after crossing our southern border. We know from our nearly 100 years of service that family separation and detention can cause severe, long-lasting trauma, which ultimately results in the loss of childhood.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thats horrible, how many children are they helping the u.s

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thanks to the generosity of donors like you, we help the nation's most vulnerable children become ready for kindergarten _ and excel by third grade _ so they can succeed in school and in life. Plus our teams are there before, during and after emergencies _ preparing children, protecting them and helping them cope in the aftermath.  Save the Children is a leading advocate for children, ensuring their voices are heard and their best interests are prioritized. We fill critical gaps in services and deliver scalable solutions to the challenges children face.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do they only support children in the U.S>

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, we support children all over the world. Children may only be 20% of our population, but they are 100% of our future. That's why advocacy is core to Save the Children's work on behalf of all kids across the United States. We're building bipartisan support at the local, state and federal level to make sure every child in the U.S. has access to high-quality learning opportunities, and much more.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That is wonderful to hear. I am glad to hear more about this organization. I wish I could help.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: All across the globe, children are dying from preventable causes, missing out on education due to poverty or gender, suffering from violence, exploitation and neglect, and are vulnerable in times of crisis. In every corner of the world, children need a strong voice to stand up for them, work on their behalf and make their lives better.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I agree that the children need a voice.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Every penny counts, to learn more about all of our programs please visir http:// URL

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I will check out the site, and thank you for telling me more about the charity

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are moe then welcome have a blessed evening.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you, you as well
